## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [alignment](./spotfire-api.popoutoptions.alignment.md) | <code>&quot;Left&quot; &#124; &quot;Right&quot; &#124; &quot;Top&quot; &#124; &quot;Bottom&quot;</code> | Position of the popout in relation to the passed coordinates. |
|  [autoClose](./spotfire-api.popoutoptions.autoclose.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Automatically close the popout when a control is clicked. |
|  [x](./spotfire-api.popoutoptions.x.md) | <code>number</code> | Horizontal pixel coordinate of the Popout. |
|  [y](./spotfire-api.popoutoptions.y.md) | <code>number</code> | Vertical pixel coordinate of the Popout. |
